title: The UNP, the Sunday Paper and the Defence Secretary
content: Onlanka News – By N.Iresha Ratnayake It was ironic to read a scurrilous article by a Sunday newspaper regarding a provocative interview between its Editor and the Defence Secretary Gotabhaya Rajapaksa. From the reading of the contents, one could realize that the Editor deliberately provoked the Defence Secretary as that has been the forte of…
